entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
